roleset.name: living in a location for an extended period

example.name: arg1
example.text: Three years ago , the exchange took up residence in a space-age tower of steel and glass -- evocative of the kind of modern architecture that Britain 's Prince Charles has denounced .
example.arg: in a space-age tower of steel and glass -- evocative of the kind of modern architecture that Britain 's Prince Charles has denounced

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on reside-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls exist-47.1-1, lodge-46.

example.name: both args
example.text: During the time of his residence in Mourhead, Michael Higgins was united in marriage to Agnes Peterson,
